sect1.title: Authentication Client
sect1.para: The configuration file must be in the JSON format. Verify that both autoyast2 and autoyast2-installation are installed. Use the Autoinstallation Configuration module in &yast; to generate a valid JSON configuration file. Launch &yast; and switch to the MiscellaneousAutoinstallation Configuration. Choose Network ServicesUser Logon Management, click Edit, and configure the available settings. Click OK when done. To save the generated configuration file, use FileSave.

tip.title: Using ldaps://
tip.para: To use LDAP with native SSL (rather than TLS), add the ldaps resource.
